Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Touhy/California
ShortDescription: Eastbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Touhy, Western and Lunt, : due to, street blockage near Touhy/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Touhy, Western and Lunt, : due to, street blockage near Touhy/California.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Shuttle buses are available from Fullerton to State/Lake to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to police activity.

Allow extra travel time.
